meanings.definition: The first meal of the day, typically eaten in the morning.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, I enjoy a delicious breakfast of cereal and milk.
meanings.sent2: I always make sure to have breakfast before starting my day.
meanings.sent3: The breakfast table was set with colorful plates and steaming coffee.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise painted the sky with hues of orange, just like a breakfast of fruit.
meanings.sent5: The smell of bacon sizzling on the stove filled the kitchen, signaling breakfast time.

meanings.sent1: I breakfasted on toast and jam this morning.
meanings.sent2: She always breakfasts on oatmeal to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: The family breakfasted together, sharing stories and laughter.
meanings.sent4: As the birds chirped outside, she breakfasted peacefully by the window.
meanings.sent5: He breakfasted quickly, eager to start his day of adventure.
